name: MorePoints
slogan: Optimise your credit card usage and get more points
description: The product is helping people to get the most from their credit cards in terms of getting more points and other benefits. Will share more with interested candidates

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description:
You will be employee #3

I have a proven idea + funding, need a top team to execute on this. 

* Individual is expected to lead all the backend development of the mobile app. 
* **You need to have experience in payments processing business** and proven track record of high achievements
jobs.descriptionHtml:
You will be employee #3

I have a proven idea + funding, need a top team to execute on this.

  • Individual is expected to lead all the backend development of the mobile app.
  • You need to have experience in payments processing business and proven track record of high achievements

jobs.title: CTO and Co-founder
jobs.description:
(Required)
You need to have strong background in payments business:
* know ins and outs of card scheme providers, processors and acquirers
* have an idea around required licenses for payments
* manage team of 2-3 developers (front/back)

(Preferred)
* ex-fintech (Revolut, Monzo, Starling, etc)

Unique opportunity to join a future unicorn start-up and build the top performing team.
